articles.author: Madeline Holcombe, Jackie Wattles
articles.title: European Space Agency hosts first Mars live stream - CNN
articles.description: The images we have seen of Mars have been those of the past. But now, for the first time, you can see the planet live.
articles.content:
Here is Mars in real time.
The European Space Agency is streaming on YouTube the first live images directly from Mars.
Over the course of an hour, new images of Mars are expected about every 50 sec… [+2359 chars]
